title: 박영준
content:
박영준은 서울
공과대학
컴퓨터소프트웨어학부
교수이다.
위치:
ITBT관
403-2호
연락처: 02-2220-2401 / yongjunpark@hanyang.ac.kr
연구실:
컴퓨터구조 및 시스템SW 연구실
학력
05/2009 – 08/2013    Ph.D. in Electrical Engineering, University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, MI (Advised by Prof. Scott Mahlke)
09/2007 – 04/2009    M.S.E in Electrical Engineering, University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, MI
03/1999 – 02/2007     B.S. in Electronic and Electrical Engineering, Pohang University of Science and Technology (POSTECH), Pohang, Korea
경력
03/2017 - Present Assistant Professor at Hanyang University, Seoul, Korea
09/2014 - 02/2017 Assistant Professor at Hongik University, Seoul, Korea
05/2013 – 08/2014 Software Architect at Intel Labs, Santa Clara, CA
01/2002 - 01/2005 Researcher and Engineer at ALTECH (Airlink Technology), Seoul, Korea
